metadata.title: ENS Tailwind Pax S300 7" Latch and Lock Pole Mount Terminal Stand, Adhesive Installation, Black
features: This is a 7” pole mount terminal stand designed for the PAX S300 terminals; stand is a lightweight composite POS system holder; design allows you to securely and invisibly hold the PAX S300 device in place

New and improved FlexiPole Plus design brings enhanced durability with an updated look and feel; works with new devices to accommodate cables with large hard-wired connectors; pivot tension is adjustable with user dial

Enhance customer experience by lifting your POS terminal and making it more accessible; pole mount terminal stand tilts 140° and swivels 330°; tall 7" design makes movement of your device from customer to merchant easier; improves overall payment transaction

Protect and preserve the POS terminals on your counters with our pole mount stand; black composite stand securely holds the terminal in place with a custom back plate; extends the life of the terminal by minimizing cable damage
Easy installation using the included adhesive pad and PEDPack for the PAX S300; comes with an adhesive pad to secure your stand to the counter; terminal not included
description: This Discount Credit Card Supply Tailwind pole mount terminal stand is designed for the PAX S300 terminals. Our new and improved FlexiPole Plus design brings enhanced durability with an updated look and feel. The design works with new devices to accommodate cables with large hard-wired connectors. For user convenience, the pivot tension can be adjusted with the dial. Our pole mount terminal stand extends the life of the terminal by minimizing cable damage and securing the device in place. Customer experience is extremely important to us at Discount Credit Card Supply. Our pole mount terminal stands are designed to not only protect your equipment, but also make it work better for your customers. The 7" pole stand makes your POS terminal more accessible by lifting it closer to the customer. The pole mount terminal stand tilts 140° and swivels 330°, making movement of your device from customer to merchant easier and improving the overall payment transaction experience. The stand is easily installed using the included PEDPack for the PAX S300. Stand also comes with an adhesive pad to secure your stand to the counter. Terminal not included.
